alert.note: Alert for Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:12AM CDT until June 18 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN JASPER...SOUTHERN NEWTON...NORTHEASTERN SMITH AND SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 1011 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Roberts, or near Newton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Newton and Garlandville around 1020 AM CDT. Hickory around 1025 AM CDT. Rose Hill around 1030 AM CDT. Chunky around 1035 AM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
